TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You have 500. 500 sand grains.

I wish weather forecast actually meant something.

granted, the forecast is so accurate it predicts the end of the world happening in 15 weeks.

I wish SpaceX would hurry up and launch the Falcon 9 Heavy.

Granted. But the wish fairy accidentally misspell SpaceX in google and all you get is a bunch of awkward scifi ****.

I wish ppl would stop using the -ish suffix after each and every word to denote imprecision. It's annoying.

Granted-ish . It is still used in the terms where it is correct, but is no longer used where it is not correct. You also explode.

I wish people would English.

Granted. However, due to a clerical error, everyone can only Engrish.

I wish for a doctor.

Granted. However, daleks hunt him down and you have to rehire him for billions of space moneys that you don't have.

I wish my violin could be extorted into playing music.

Granted, but it can only play one song and even then, violins don't need money.

I wish Tuesday wasn't as bad as monday.

Granted. Now it is worse.

I wish ppl stop preaching for me.

Granted. Now we are directly ordering you.

I wish for my own nuke.

Granted. you have one for 5 seconds, but then comes Mossad and takes it from you.

Edit: I wish I didn't forget to wish.

Granted, your wish was for donuts. You are buried alive in donuts.

I wish for a little compassion

Granted. I help you by burying you alive in donuts.

I wish I had a portion of a plane in the shape of an angle.

Granted. Your wish-ball misheard you, and you got the whole plane... coming at you at an angle. It hits you right in the face.

I wish for a wish ball.

Granted. You get a ball that wishes for things, and it enslaves you to grant an infinite amount of wishes for all eternity.

I wish I had a commander ball that improved the world by enslaving people (excluding me).

Granted. It enslaves everyone except you and goes off to produce energy for itself via people. You die, because no one is producing food for you.

Traincakes!

denied for you only screamed traincakes instead of wished for it

I wish that people would be more careful when making wishes

Granted. You get hit by a traincake.

I wish traincakes were less lethal.

Granted. Humans are immortal, at the price of DESTROYING ALL TRAINCAKES.

I wish TF2 servers could contain up to 256 players at a time, bypassing all lag problems.

Granted. But now your computer is lagging, not the server

I wish for my gigabit lan ports to teem together seamlessly

Fine, but they only teem together perfectly when covered in sodium, while you're outside, in the rain

I wish I could control the elements

Granted. The elements are now sapient, and stop letting life.

I wish the elements were sapient.

Yes, now they do nothing but tell you boring stories.

I wish I could travel between dimensions.

Yes, now they do nothing but tell you boring stories.

I wish I could travel between dimensions.

Granted, you can walk

I wish I could cook bacon off my chest

Granted. Your chest causes bacon to spontaneously appear, but it's undercooked and your chest will burst into flames if it tries to cook backon.

I wish I could use the Wishmaking Fairy's communist wand to cause bacon to spontaneously appear.

Granted. However, the communist wand demands that you must work in the fields for 40 years first.

I wish Curse was gone.
